event.title: Talk "An endangered species: computer as a universal machine" in Chemnitz, Germany
event.body: On March 16th at 10:00, Matthias Kirschner will give a speech at the Technical University Chemnitz about computers as general purpose machines and the dangers of limiting the rights of their owners. Thetalk, in German, will be held in the central lecture buildung, room V1 atReichenhainer Stra√üe 90, Chemnitz.
